subtle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: not easy to notice or understand unless you pay careful attention
subtle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The pictures are similar, but there are subtle differences between them.
The warning signs of the disease are so subtle that they are often ignored.
The dish had a subtle hint of ginger.
The flavour of the dried berries is more subtle.
subtle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: behaving in a skilful and clever way, especially using indirect methods or language to hide what you are trying to do
subtle.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I think we need a more subtle approach.
She wasn’t very subtle about it. She just said she didn’t love him anymore.
subtle.translation[0].definitions[2].def: very clever in noticing and understanding things
